T

toHex(byte[]) - Static method in class MainController
This method converts an array of bytes into a String of hexadecimal characters.
toString() - Method in class peripherals.Peripheral
 
TriggerHandler - Interface in peripherals
 
TriggerLogicBlock - Class in <Unnamed>
A TriggerLogicBlock is a LogicBlock that represents a trigger occurring in the system.
TriggerLogicBlock(Peripheral, String, String...) - Constructor for class TriggerLogicBlock
Creates a new TriggerLogicBlock object with the specified triggerString and peripheral that represent a trigger occurring in the system.
triggerName - Variable in class TriggerRequest
A String representing the trigger that occurred.
triggerOccurred(boolean, Peripheral, String, String...) - Method in class MainController
This method is called to notify the main controller of a trigger occurrence.
triggerOccurred(boolean, Peripheral, String, String...) - Method in interface peripherals.TriggerHandler
 
triggerQueue - Variable in class MainController
A LinkedBlockingQueue that holds TriggerRequest objects waiting to be acted upon.
TriggerRequest - Class in <Unnamed>
A data structure used for storing trigger requests from peripherals on the request queue.
TriggerRequest(boolean, Peripheral, String, String...) - Constructor for class TriggerRequest
Creates a TriggerRequest object.
triggers - Variable in class MainController
An ArrayList containing all of the TriggerLogicBlock objects in the automation system.
triggerString - Variable in class TriggerLogicBlock
A String that represents the trigger occurring on peripheral.
